definitions.text: the act of working out the form of something (as by making a sketch or outline or plan)
examples: he contributed to the design of a new instrument
the awkward design of the keyboard made operation difficult
it was an excellent design for living
a plan for seating guests

definitions.text: something intended as a guide for making something else
examples: a blueprint for a house
a pattern for a skirt
the coach had a design on the doors

definitions.text: an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions
examples: his intent was to provide a new translation
good intentions are not enough
it was created with the conscious aim of answering immediate needs
he made no secret of his designs

definitions.text: a preliminary sketch indicating the plan for something
examples: the design of a building

definitions.text: the creation of something in the mind
make or work out a plan for; devise
examples: They contrived to murder their boss
design a new sales strategy
plan an attack

definitions.text: plan something for a specific role or purpose or effect
examples: This room is not designed for work

definitions.text: create the design for; create or execute in an artistic or highly skilled manner
examples: Chanel designed the famous suit

definitions.text: make a design of; plan out in systematic, often graphic form
examples: design a better mousetrap
plan the new wing of the museum
Dupont designs for the house of Chanel

definitions.text: conceive or fashion in the mind; invent
examples: She designed a good excuse for not attending classes that day

definitions.text: intend or have as a purpose
examples: She designed to go far in the world of business
